thread.section_title: Temple & Webster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Temple & Webster | templeandwebster.com.au
thread.title: Sue Gordon
thread.title_full: Temple & Webster reviewed by Sue Gordon

author: Sue Gordon
title: Sue Gordon
text: The buying experience was a pleasure from start to finish. I rang to ask some questions and the staff were knowledgable, polite and so helpful. The dresser was unfortunately slightly damaged and T & W took ownership and quickly rectified the problem. They call back when they promise. I would definitely buy from them again and have no problem recommending T & W to friends. Thank you
